1: <pb/><t>Jab'xon̈ej val syal vic'an vic' svab'i. Vanxo sc'och in q'uinal d'a slajvub', vach'xo yaj ved'tal d'a campusante.</t>
2: <t>A eb' anima, oyanoch eb' in sb'uchani, masanil tiempo syac' cus in c'ol eb', maxtzac yal in colan in b'a d'a eb'.</t>
3: <t>Palta Mamin colin, yujto malaj junocxo mach syac'och sb'a in scolani, a achn̈ej syal uuj.</t>
4: <t>A ach ix a c'ub'ejel jelanil d'a juntzan̈ eb' vin̈ vamigo tic, man̈ in a cha ac'joc ganar yuj eb' vin̈.</t>
5: <t>Elocab'c'och icha syal jun ab'ix: A junoc mach syixtej junoc yamigo, axo yuninal ol ab'an syail yuj jun tas sc'ulej chi'.</t>
6: <t>A ach ix ac' yal chuc eb' anima d'ayin, ix laj stzub'an in sat eb'.</t>
7: <t>Toxon̈ej q'uic'aminac vilan yuj in yaelal. Ichato man̈ chequeloc in nivanil tic, yujto ix in te b'acb'i.</t>
8: <t>Ayic syilan eb' anima vach' sb'eyb'al tas tzin ic'an tic, sat sc'ol eb', scot yoval eb', yujto chuc in snaan eb'.</t>
9: <t>A eb' vach' sb'eyb'al, vach'n̈ej ol elc'och eb'. A eb' malaj chucal sc'ulej, ol q'uen̈ejchaan̈ eb'.</t>
10: <t>Palta cotan̈ec d'a tic ex vamigo. Malaj junoc aj pensar tz'ilchaj vuj d'a e cal.</t>
11: <t>B'elb'on yec' in q'uinal, axo tas nab'il vuuj, ma tas tzin nib'ej, toxo ix juvieli.</t>
12: <t>A ex tic a d'ac'valil tzeyaloch c'ualil, axo yic q'uic'q'uinal, tzeyalani, lac'anxo ay saquilq'uinal.</t>
13: <t>Toxon̈ej tzin tan̈vej in chami, yic sc'och telan in nivanil svay d'a cal q'uic'alq'uinal.</t>
14: <t>A noc' a'ay yed' campusante svaloch in mam in nunoc yed' vanab'oc.</t>
15: <t>¿B'ajtil ay tas svac'och yipoc in c'ool? ¿Ay am mach ojtannac tas ol in ajoc?</t>
16: <t>¿Tom ol c'och jun chi' ved' d'a yed'tal eb' chamnac? ¿Tom ol cann̈ej ved' ta' d'a yol lum luum chi'? xchi vin̈aj Job chi'.</t>
